meanings.definition: Counteracting or preventing symptoms of schizophrenia.
meanings.sent1: The antischizophrenic medication helped improve his mental health.
meanings.sent2: She believed in the power of antischizophrenic therapies to alleviate her symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The doctor prescribed an antischizophrenic drug that made him feel more like himself.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as an antischizophrenic shield against negative thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The calming music had an antischizophrenic effect on her mind, bringing clarity and peace.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that opposes the effects of schizophrenia.
meanings.sent1: He was relieved to find an effective antischizophrenic for his condition.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked various antischizophrenics to cater to different patient needs.
meanings.sent3: The new antischizophrenic on the market promised hope for many families.
meanings.sent4: The support group acted as a social antischizophrenic, providing comfort and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The breakthrough in antischizophrenic research brought optimism to the medical community.
